data.content:
Singed (Hextech Singed)

RP Cost: 10

Release Date: November 15, 2012

Singed, the Mad Chemist, is a unique champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his toxic abilities and unorthodox playstyle, Singed has become a favorite among players who enjoy disrupting the enemy team and causing chaos on the battlefield. With his Hextech Singed skin, Singed takes on a new, futuristic look that adds a touch of technological flair to his already eccentric persona.

The Hextech Singed skin was released on November 15, 2012, and is available for purchase in the in-game store for 10 RP. This skin transforms Singed into a mechanical marvel, with his signature poison now emanating from a high-tech backpack. The skin features a sleek, metallic suit with glowing blue accents, giving Singed a more futuristic appearance compared to his default skin.

As a chemist obsessed with experimentation, Singed's Hextech Singed skin perfectly captures his affinity for all things scientific and technological. The skin showcases Singed's ingenuity and his willingness to push the boundaries of what is possible. With his new look, Singed becomes an even more formidable force on the battlefield, striking fear into the hearts of his enemies.

Now, let's delve into the story of Singed and explore his strengths, weaknesses, and his place in the game.

The Mad Chemist

Singed, also known as the Mad Chemist, is a Zaunite alchemist who has dedicated his life to the pursuit of knowledge and power. He is a brilliant scientist with a twisted mind, constantly seeking new ways to test the limits of his chemical concoctions. Singed's experiments often involve volatile and dangerous substances, making him a feared figure in the city of Zaun.

In the game, Singed is classified as a tank and disruptor, excelling at disrupting the enemy team and soaking up damage. His unique playstyle revolves around his ability to leave a trail of poison behind him as he moves, damaging any enemies who dare to chase him. Singed's ultimate ability, Insanity Potion, further enhances his durability and allows him to wreak havoc in team fights.

While Singed's playstyle may seem unorthodox, it is precisely this unpredictability that makes him such a formidable champion. His ability to manipulate the battlefield and control the flow of the game can turn the tide in his team's favor. However, Singed's reliance on his poison trail and his lack of traditional crowd control abilities make him vulnerable to champions who can kite him or burst him down quickly.

Despite his weaknesses, Singed has found a place in the hearts of many players. His unique playstyle and iconic laugh have made him a fan favorite, and his Hextech Singed skin adds an extra layer of excitement for those who enjoy playing this eccentric champion.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Singed's appearances, including his default skin, as well as his other skins such as Snow Day Singed, Surfer Singed, and many more. Whether you're a fan of Singed or simply curious about his different looks, this page is your go-to resource for all things Singed.

So, embrace the madness and unleash chaos on the battlefield with Singed's Hextech Singed skin. With its futuristic design and technological prowess, this skin is sure to make a statement and leave your enemies in awe.

Singed (Snow Day Singed)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: December 17, 2013

League of Legends is known for its vast array of champions, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. One such champion is Singed, a mad chemist who revels in chaos and destruction. Singed is a versatile champion who excels in disrupting the enemy team and creating chaos on the battlefield. With his Snow Day Singed skin, Singed takes on a festive and playful appearance, perfect for spreading holiday cheer while leaving a trail of toxic fumes in his wake.

Snow Day Singed is a skin that was released on December 17, 2013, just in time for the holiday season. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin offers players a chance to experience Singed in a whole new light. With its unique visual effects and animations, Snow Day Singed brings a whimsical and lighthearted feel to the champion.

The Snow Day Singed skin features Singed dressed in a cozy winter outfit, complete with a fluffy red and white Santa hat, a warm scarf, and mittens. His signature poison trail is transformed into a trail of snowflakes, leaving a wintry path behind him as he traverses the battlefield. Additionally, his Mega Adhesive ability now leaves behind a pool of slippery ice, making it even more difficult for enemies to escape his clutches.

One of the standout features of the Snow Day Singed skin is the unique recall animation. When Singed recalls, he pulls out a sled and slides down a snowy hill, adding a touch of fun and whimsy to the champion. This recall animation perfectly captures the playful nature of the skin and adds an extra layer of enjoyment for players.

Now that we've covered the details of the Snow Day Singed skin, let's delve into the story of Singed himself. Singed, also known as the Mad Chemist, is a Zaunite alchemist who is infamous for his deadly concoctions and twisted experiments. He is driven by a desire to push the boundaries of science and is willing to sacrifice anything and anyone to achieve his goals.

In the world of League of Legends, Singed is a tanky champion who excels at disrupting the enemy team and creating chaos in team fights. His passive ability, Noxious Slipstream, grants him bonus movement speed when he uses his abilities, allowing him to chase down enemies or escape dangerous situations. His Q ability, Poison Trail, leaves a trail of poison behind him, dealing damage over time to any enemies who come into contact with it. His W ability, Mega Adhesive, creates a pool of sticky goo that slows enemies and hinders their movement. Singed's E ability, Fling, allows him to toss an enemy over his shoulder, dealing damage and potentially displacing them into his team. Finally, his ultimate ability, Insanity Potion, grants him increased stats and enhances his abilities for a short duration, making him even more formidable in combat.

Singed's playstyle revolves around creating chaos and disruption in team fights. He excels at diving into the enemy team, flinging priority targets into his team, and spreading poison with his Poison Trail. Singed's ability to disrupt the enemy team and soak up damage makes him a valuable asset in team fights, allowing his teammates to follow up and secure kills. However, Singed's lack of hard crowd control and reliance on his poison trail for damage means that he can struggle against champions with high mobility or who can easily avoid his poison trail.

In the lore of League of Legends, Singed has a dark and twisted past. He was once a respected alchemist in Zaun, but his experiments took a sinister turn when he became obsessed with creating the perfect chemical weapon. Singed's experiments led to the creation of a deadly poison known as Noxian Guile, which he unleashed on the battlefield during the Ionian conflict. Singed's actions caused widespread devastation and earned him a reputation as a madman.

Despite his dark past, Singed has found a place in the League of Legends, where he continues to wreak havoc and spread chaos. His Snow Day Singed skin offers players a chance to experience Singed in a more lighthearted and festive way, while still embodying his chaotic nature.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Singed, including his Snow Day Singed skin. Whether you're a fan of Singed or simply curious about his different looks, this page is your one-stop destination for all things Singed.

Singed (Augmented Singed)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: November 29, 2011

Singed, the Mad Chemist, is a unique champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his toxic abilities and unorthodox playstyle, Singed has become a fan favorite over the years. With a wide range of skins available, one of the most notable and intriguing options is the

skin.

Released on November 29, 2011, the Augmented Singed skin offers players a fresh and futuristic take on the Mad Chemist. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin transforms Singed into a high-tech, cybernetic version of himself. With its sleek design and unique visual effects, Augmented Singed is a must-have for Singed enthusiasts and collectors alike.

The Story of Augmented Singed

In the lore of League of Legends, Singed is a brilliant chemist who uses his knowledge to create deadly concoctions and wreak havoc on the battlefield. Augmented Singed takes this concept to the next level by envisioning a future where Singed has embraced technology to enhance his abilities.

In this alternate reality, Singed has undergone cybernetic enhancements, replacing parts of his body with advanced machinery. His once tattered lab coat is now a sleek, metallic suit, adorned with glowing neon lights. Augmented Singed's signature weapon, the poison gas tank on his back, has been upgraded to emit a more potent and visually striking toxic gas.

The skin's visual effects are a sight to behold. As Singed moves, his cybernetic limbs emit a trail of energy, leaving a futuristic glow in his wake. The poison gas he releases takes on an otherworldly hue, adding an extra layer of menace to his already deadly abilities. Augmented Singed truly stands out on the battlefield, commanding attention with his unique appearance and animations.

Singed: The Mad Chemist

Now that we've explored the Augmented Singed skin, let's delve into the champion himself. Singed is a tanky top laner who excels at disrupting the enemy team and causing chaos in team fights. His kit revolves around his poison trail, which damages enemies over time as they stand in it. Singed's ultimate ability, Insanity Potion, enhances his stats and makes him even more formidable in battle.

Strengths:

  • High Durability: Singed's passive ability, Empowered Bulwark, grants him bonus health for each point of mana he has. This allows him to build tanky items and become incredibly difficult to kill.
  • Disruptive Playstyle: Singed's poison trail and fling ability can disrupt the enemy team's positioning, making it difficult for them to engage or disengage effectively.
  • Split Pushing Power: Singed's ability to clear waves quickly and escape from sticky situations makes him an excellent split pusher. He can draw enemy attention to the side lanes while his team takes objectives elsewhere.

Weaknesses:

  • Lack of Hard Crowd Control: Singed's only form of crowd control is his fling ability, which can be difficult to land consistently. This makes him reliant on his team for reliable crowd control in team fights.
  • Weak Early Game: Singed can struggle in the early laning phase, especially against champions with strong poke or ranged abilities. He often needs time to scale and become a threat in the later stages of the game.
  • Mana Dependency: Singed's abilities consume a significant amount of mana, making him vulnerable if he runs out during extended engagements. Proper mana management is crucial for success.

Singed has been a staple in the League of Legends roster since the game's early days. His unique playstyle and iconic laugh have made him a beloved champion among players. Whether you enjoy running circles around your opponents, flinging them into your team, or simply watching the world burn with your poison trail, Singed offers a playstyle that is both fun and effective.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Singed's appearances, including the Augmented Singed skin. Explore the different options available and choose the one that best suits your style. Whether you prefer the classic look or the futuristic vibes of Augmented Singed, you're sure to make an impact on the Rift with this iconic champion.

Singed (Mad Scientist Singed)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: October 10, 2011

Mad Scientist Singed is a skin for the champion Singed in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin transforms Singed into a crazed scientist, complete with a lab coat, goggles, and a backpack filled with mysterious potions and chemicals. With its unique design and animations, Mad Scientist Singed offers players a fun and quirky alternative to the traditional appearance of Singed.

Released on October 10, 2011, Mad Scientist Singed quickly became a fan favorite among players. Its distinct visual style and playful theme perfectly complement Singed's character, making it a must-have skin for Singed enthusiasts.

The costume features Singed wearing a white lab coat with various stains and patches, giving him the appearance of a mad scientist who has been experimenting for hours on end. The coat is adorned with pockets filled with vials and test tubes, showcasing Singed's obsession with concocting dangerous potions. His goggles, perched on his forehead, add an extra touch of scientific flair to his look.

One of the standout features of Mad Scientist Singed is his backpack, which is filled to the brim with colorful potions and bubbling chemicals. As Singed moves around the battlefield, the potions slosh and bubble, adding a dynamic element to his appearance. This attention to detail truly brings the skin to life and enhances the overall gaming experience.

In addition to the visual changes, Mad Scientist Singed also boasts unique animations and sound effects. When Singed activates his ultimate ability, Insanity Potion, he emits a distinct sound that resembles the bubbling of a cauldron, further emphasizing his mad scientist persona. These small but impactful details make playing as Mad Scientist Singed a delight for both the player and those watching.

Now, let's delve into the story of Singed and how he fits into the world of League of Legends. Singed, also known as

is a Zaunite alchemist who is infamous for his deadly concoctions and twisted experiments. He is driven by a relentless pursuit of knowledge and power, often resorting to unethical means to achieve his goals.

Singed's past is shrouded in mystery, but it is believed that he was once a respected chemist who worked for the Noxian military. However, his insatiable thirst for power led him down a dark path, and he eventually turned his back on Noxus to pursue his own twisted experiments in Zaun.

In the game, Singed is a tanky champion who excels at disrupting the enemy team and causing chaos on the battlefield. His passive ability, Noxious Slipstream, grants him increased movement speed when he uses his abilities, allowing him to chase down enemies or escape dangerous situations. His Q ability, Poison Trail, leaves a trail of toxic gas behind him, damaging enemies over time. Singed's W ability, Mega Adhesive, creates a sticky puddle that slows and grounds enemies, preventing them from using mobility spells or abilities. His E ability, Fling, allows him to toss an enemy over his shoulder, dealing damage and potentially displacing them into his team. Finally, Singed's ultimate ability, Insanity Potion, grants him increased stats and movement speed, making him even more formidable in team fights.

Singed's playstyle revolves around disrupting the enemy team and creating chaos in team fights. With his Poison Trail and Mega Adhesive, he can control the battlefield and force enemies to either engage or retreat. Singed's Fling ability is particularly useful for catching out-of-position enemies and bringing them into the midst of his team, setting up kills for his allies. His ultimate ability, Insanity Potion, provides him with a significant power boost, allowing him to dive into the enemy team and wreak havoc.

Overall, Singed is a unique and iconic champion in League of Legends. His Mad Scientist Singed skin adds an extra layer of fun and personality to his character, making him even more enjoyable to play. Whether you're a fan of Singed or simply appreciate the creativity and attention to detail in skin design, Mad Scientist Singed is a fantastic addition to your collection.

For more information about Singed and his various appearances, including Mad Scientist Singed, be sure to visit our page dedicated to Singed on the League of Legends website. There, you can find detailed information, videos, and more to enhance your League of Legends experience.

Singed: The Mad Chemist

Release Date: April 18, 2009

League of Legends is a game filled with diverse and unique champions, each with their own captivating stories and abilities. One such champion is Singed, also known as The Mad Chemist. Singed was released on April 18, 2009, and has since become a fan-favorite due to his unconventional playstyle and intriguing lore.

The Story of Singed

Singed's story begins in the city-state of Zaun, a place known for its dark and twisted experiments. Born into a wealthy family, Singed was always fascinated by chemistry and the potential it held for both destruction and creation. However, his passion for experimentation soon took a dangerous turn.

Driven by his insatiable curiosity, Singed delved into forbidden alchemical practices, pushing the boundaries of what was considered ethical. His experiments often involved toxic substances and volatile mixtures, causing chaos and destruction in his wake. Singed's obsession with chemical warfare led him to create a deadly concoction known as

a potent poison that could cripple even the strongest of foes.

As his reputation grew, Singed caught the attention of the Noxian High Command, who saw his skills as a valuable asset in their conquests. Singed was recruited into the Noxian military, where he became a living weapon, using his deadly chemicals to sow chaos and confusion on the battlefield. His unorthodox methods and disregard for his own safety earned him the nickname

Despite his allegiance to Noxus, Singed's true loyalty lies with his insatiable thirst for knowledge and the pursuit of his twisted experiments. He sees the battlefield as his laboratory, where he can test the limits of his chemical creations and observe the effects they have on his enemies.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Singed is a unique champion with a playstyle that revolves around disruption and area control. His kit allows him to manipulate the battlefield and create chaos, making him a formidable force in team fights. However, like any champion, Singed has his own set of strengths and weaknesses.

One of Singed's greatest strengths is his ability to chase down enemies and disrupt their movements. His Q ability,

leaves a trail of toxic gas behind him, damaging and slowing any enemies caught in its path. This ability not only allows Singed to deal consistent damage but also makes it difficult for enemies to escape his grasp.

Another strength of Singed is his ultimate ability,

When activated, Singed gains increased movement speed, health regeneration, and crowd control reduction. This makes him incredibly durable and difficult to kill, allowing him to dive into the enemy team and disrupt their backline.

However, Singed also has his fair share of weaknesses. One of his main weaknesses is his lack of ranged abilities. Singed relies heavily on getting up close and personal with his enemies, which can leave him vulnerable to champions with long-range poke or crowd control.

Additionally, Singed's reliance on his poison trail for damage means that he struggles against champions who can easily negate or avoid his toxic gas. Champions with high mobility or the ability to block or cleanse crowd control effects can make it challenging for Singed to stick to his targets and deal damage.

Singed's Place in the Game

Singed's unique playstyle and disruptive abilities make him a popular pick in both casual and competitive play. His ability to control the battlefield and disrupt enemy movements can turn the tide of team fights and create opportunities for his team to secure objectives.

In the top lane, Singed is known for his ability to proxy farm, a strategy where he bypasses the enemy minions and farms behind the enemy turret. This strategy not only denies the enemy laner farm but also draws attention from the enemy team, allowing Singed's teammates to secure objectives elsewhere on the map.

Singed's playstyle also makes him an excellent split-pusher. With his high mobility and ability to escape sticky situations, Singed can apply pressure in side lanes while his team focuses on other objectives. His ability to draw multiple enemies to deal with him creates opportunities for his team to secure objectives or engage in favorable team fights.

Furthermore, Singed's disruptive abilities make him a valuable asset in team fights. His poison trail and fling ability, which allows him to toss enemies behind him, can disrupt the enemy team's positioning and create chaos. Singed excels at diving into the enemy backline and disrupting their carries, allowing his team to follow up and secure kills.

Overall, Singed is a champion that requires a unique playstyle and mindset. His unorthodox methods and disruptive abilities make him a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. Whether you enjoy wreaking havoc in team fights or applying pressure in side lanes, Singed offers a thrilling and unconventional playstyle that is sure to keep you entertained.

For more information on Singed and to explore his various skins, be sure to visit our website's dedicated page for Singed. There, you can find detailed information, videos, and images of all his skins, allowing you to choose the perfect look for your Mad Chemist.

Singed (SSW Singed)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: May 14, 2014

League of Legends is a game that offers a wide variety of champions, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. One such champion is Singed, a mad chemist who revels in chaos and destruction. Singed is known for his ability to manipulate chemicals and create deadly concoctions, making him a formidable force on the battlefield.

One of Singed's most iconic skins is the

skin, which was released on May 14, 2014. This skin pays homage to the professional League of Legends team, Samsung White, who emerged victorious in the 2014 World Championship. The SSW Singed skin features Singed dressed in the team's colors, sporting a sleek white suit with blue accents.

The SSW Singed skin is available for purchase in the in-game store for 975 RP. With its unique design and references to the competitive scene, this skin is a must-have for Singed enthusiasts and fans of Samsung White alike.

Singed's Story

Singed, also known as the Mad Chemist, has a dark and twisted past within the League of Legends universe. Once a respected alchemist in Zaun, Singed's thirst for power and knowledge led him down a dangerous path. He delved into forbidden experiments, using volatile chemicals to enhance his own physical abilities.

As his experiments grew more reckless, Singed's mind became consumed by madness. He abandoned his former life and embraced chaos, using his newfound powers to wreak havoc on the world. Singed's twisted creations and deadly concoctions became the stuff of nightmares, earning him a fearsome reputation.

In the game, Singed is a tanky champion who excels at disrupting the enemy team and causing chaos in team fights. His passive ability, Noxious Slipstream, grants him increased movement speed when he uses his abilities, allowing him to chase down enemies or escape dangerous situations. Singed's Q ability, Poison Trail, leaves a trail of toxic gas behind him, damaging enemies over time. His W ability, Mega Adhesive, creates a sticky pool that slows and grounds enemies, preventing them from using mobility spells. Singed's E ability, Fling, allows him to toss an enemy over his shoulder, dealing damage and potentially displacing them into his team. Finally, his ultimate ability, Insanity Potion, grants Singed increased stats and enhances his abilities for a short duration, making him even more formidable in combat.

Despite his chaotic nature, Singed has found a place within the League of Legends community. He is a popular pick among players who enjoy playing disruptive tanks and causing chaos on the battlefield. Singed's unique playstyle and iconic abilities make him a memorable champion to play as or against.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Singed's appearances, including the SSW Singed skin. Whether you're a fan of Singed's chaotic playstyle or simply appreciate the sleek design of the SSW Singed skin, this page is a treasure trove of information for Singed enthusiasts.

Singed (Beekeeper Singed)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: April 1, 2015

League of Legends is known for its diverse range of champions and their unique skins. One such skin that stands out is

This whimsical and charming skin transforms the mad chemist into a beekeeper, complete with a beekeeper's hat, protective suit, and a swarm of buzzing bees. Released on April 1, 2015, this skin quickly became a fan favorite due to its playful nature and the hilarious animations it brings to the game.

The Beekeeper Singed skin costs 1350 RP, making it a mid-tier skin in terms of pricing. However, the attention to detail and the overall theme of the skin make it worth every Riot Point spent. Let's dive into the details of this delightful skin and explore what makes it so special.

The Buzzing Details

Beekeeper Singed is a skin that truly captures the essence of a beekeeper. Singed's iconic green potion is replaced with a jar of honey, and his poison trail becomes a trail of buzzing bees. The honey jar on his back is intricately designed, with a wooden frame and a glass jar filled with golden honey. The bees that follow Singed create a mesmerizing visual effect as they swarm around him, leaving a trail of honey in their wake.

One of the standout features of this skin is Singed's beekeeper hat. The hat is adorned with a bee-shaped brooch and a net that covers Singed's face, protecting him from bee stings. The attention to detail in the design of the hat is commendable, with small stitches and patterns that add to the overall charm of the skin.

Additionally, Beekeeper Singed's abilities receive unique visual effects. When Singed activates his Q ability,
a cloud of bees follows him, leaving a trail of honey behind. His W ability,
creates a sticky honey puddle on the ground, ensnaring his enemies. Singed's E ability,
showcases a comical animation where he tosses his enemy into the air, only for them to be swarmed by bees. Finally, Singed's ultimate ability,

causes him to emit a cloud of bees, enhancing his strength and speed.

The Mad Chemist's Story

Singed, also known as the Mad Chemist, is a champion in League of Legends who hails from Zaun, the city of progress and innovation. He is a brilliant but deranged scientist who experiments with volatile chemicals and concoctions. Singed's ultimate goal is to create the perfect chemical weapon, and he stops at nothing to achieve his twisted ambitions.

In the game, Singed is primarily played as a tanky disruptor in the top lane. His kit revolves around poisoning his enemies, flinging them into danger, and creating chaos in team fights. Singed's passive ability,

grants him increased movement speed when he uses his abilities, allowing him to chase down enemies or escape dangerous situations.

One of Singed's greatest strengths is his ability to disrupt the enemy team. His Q ability,
leaves a trail of poison behind him, damaging enemies who stand in it. This ability is particularly effective when combined with his W ability,
which creates a sticky area that slows enemies and makes it difficult for them to escape. Singed's E ability,

allows him to toss an enemy over his shoulder, dealing damage and potentially throwing them into his team or a dangerous position.

However, Singed also has his weaknesses. He lacks reliable crowd control and can struggle against champions with high mobility or ranged attacks. Additionally, his playstyle requires a deep understanding of positioning and map awareness, as Singed often excels at split-pushing and drawing attention away from important objectives.

Despite his chaotic nature, Singed has become an iconic champion in League of Legends. His unique playstyle and memorable appearance have made him a favorite among players who enjoy unorthodox strategies and disruptive gameplay. Whether you're flinging enemies into your team or leaving a trail of poison in your wake, Singed is a champion that demands attention and can turn the tide of battle.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Singed's appearances, including the delightful Beekeeper Singed skin. Whether you're a fan of Singed's mad scientist persona or simply enjoy the whimsy of a beekeeper, this skin is sure to bring a smile to your face as you wreak havoc on the Rift.

Singed (Surfer Singed)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: August 1, 2011

Surfer Singed is a skin for the champion Singed in the popular online game League of Legends. This skin was released on August 1, 2011, and can be purchased for 975 RP. It transforms Singed into a beach-loving surfer, complete with a surfboard and tropical attire. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Surfer Singed and explore all the details of this unique skin.

The Story of Surfer Singed

Surfer Singed is a lighthearted and whimsical skin that takes Singed, the Mad Chemist, out of his usual laboratory and throws him into the sunny beaches of Runeterra. With his surfboard in hand, Singed is ready to catch some waves and spread chaos in a whole new way.

The skin features Singed wearing a colorful Hawaiian shirt, board shorts, and flip-flops. His iconic shield is transformed into a surfboard, and his poison trail leaves behind a trail of sand instead of toxic fumes. Surfer Singed brings a fun and relaxed vibe to the usually sinister champion, showcasing a different side of his personality.

Surfer Singed is not just a cosmetic change; it also comes with unique animations and sound effects. When Singed activates his ultimate ability, Insanity Potion, he takes a refreshing sip from a coconut instead of his usual concoction. Additionally, his recall animation shows him riding a wave on his surfboard, adding an extra touch of style to his gameplay.

Singed: The Mad Chemist

Singed, the Mad Chemist, is a champion in League of Legends known for his disruptive playstyle and ability to wreak havoc on the battlefield. He is a melee tank who excels at crowd control and disruption, making him a formidable force in team fights.

With his signature ability, Poison Trail, Singed leaves a trail of toxic gas behind him, damaging and slowing enemies caught in its path. This ability allows him to control the flow of battle and create zones of danger for his opponents. Combined with his other abilities, Singed can chase down enemies, fling them over his shoulder with Fling, and even become immune to crowd control effects with his ultimate, Insanity Potion.

Singed's playstyle revolves around disruption and creating chaos in team fights. He excels at diving into the enemy backline, disrupting their positioning, and forcing them to deal with his presence. His ability to soak up damage and disrupt the enemy team makes him a valuable asset in both solo queue and competitive play.

In terms of weaknesses, Singed is vulnerable to champions with high burst damage and crowd control. His lack of ranged abilities also makes him susceptible to kiting and poke. Additionally, Singed's playstyle requires good positioning and decision-making, as he often needs to dive deep into the enemy team to be effective. This can be risky if not executed properly.

Throughout his history in League of Legends, Singed has become an iconic champion known for his unique playstyle and memorable quotes. He has been a staple pick in the top lane and has seen success in various metas. Singed's popularity is also attributed to his distinct appearance and personality, which sets him apart from other champions in the game.

Explore Singed's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Singed and his various appearances in League of Legends, you can find detailed information and videos on our dedicated page. From classic skins to epic and legendary ones, Singed has a wide range of options to suit every player's taste. Whether you prefer the menacing look of Hextech Singed or the whimsical charm of Surfer Singed, there is a skin for everyone.

So, dive into the world of Singed and discover the many faces of this iconic champion. Whether you choose to unleash chaos as the Mad Chemist or catch some waves as Surfer Singed, you're sure to have a blast on the Rift!

Singed (Astronaut Singed)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: July 20, 2017

League of Legends is known for its diverse range of champions and their unique skins. One such skin that stands out is

This skin takes Singed, the Mad Chemist, to new heights by transforming him into an intergalactic explorer. With its futuristic design and space-themed abilities, Astronaut Singed offers players a fresh and exciting way to experience the game.

As the name suggests, Astronaut Singed outfits the champion in a high-tech spacesuit, complete with a helmet and jetpack. Singed's signature poison gas is replaced with a cosmic green gas, giving it an otherworldly feel. The skin also features new animations, sound effects, and recall animation, all of which add to the immersive experience of playing as an astronaut.

Released on July 20, 2017, Astronaut Singed quickly became a fan favorite. Its unique theme and attention to detail make it a must-have for Singed enthusiasts and collectors alike. The skin's price of 1350 RP reflects the effort put into creating this visually stunning and thematically fitting costume.

Now, let's delve into the story behind Astronaut Singed and explore the lore of Singed himself. Singed, also known as the Mad Chemist, is a Zaunite alchemist who is infamous for his deadly concoctions and twisted experiments. He is driven by a desire to push the boundaries of science, regardless of the consequences.

In the world of League of Legends, Singed's past is shrouded in mystery. It is believed that he was once a respected chemist, but his thirst for knowledge led him down a dark path. Singed's experiments became increasingly dangerous, and he eventually became an outcast in Zaun, a city known for its technological advancements and morally ambiguous practices.

Despite his exile, Singed continued his research in secret, developing potent poisons and volatile mixtures. He saw the League of Legends as an opportunity to test his creations on the battlefield, and he joined the ranks of champions to further his twisted agenda.

In the game, Singed is a unique champion who excels at disrupting the enemy team and creating chaos on the battlefield. His passive ability, Noxious Slipstream, grants him bonus movement speed when he uses his abilities, allowing him to chase down enemies or escape dangerous situations. His Q ability, Poison Trail, leaves a trail of toxic gas behind him, damaging enemies over time. Singed's W ability, Mega Adhesive, creates a sticky puddle that slows enemies caught within it, making it easier for Singed and his team to catch their foes. His E ability, Fling, allows Singed to toss an enemy over his shoulder, dealing damage and potentially throwing them into his team. Finally, his ultimate ability, Insanity Potion, enhances Singed's abilities and grants him increased stats for a short duration, making him even more formidable in combat.

Singed's playstyle revolves around disruption and hit-and-run tactics. He excels at singling out squishy targets and flinging them into his team, causing chaos and confusion. His poison trail also makes him a nuisance to deal with, as enemies must constantly be aware of their positioning to avoid taking damage. Singed's ultimate ability, Insanity Potion, allows him to become even more durable and deal increased damage, making him a force to be reckoned with in team fights.

With his unique playstyle and iconic appearance, Singed has become a beloved champion among League of Legends players. Whether you're a fan of his toxic abilities or his twisted personality, Singed offers a unique and rewarding experience on the battlefield.

The Story of Resistance Singed

In the lore of League of Legends, Singed is a chemist from Zaun, a city known for its technological advancements and dark experiments. Singed's obsession with chemistry and his disregard for ethical boundaries led him down a path of madness. He became a master of toxic concoctions, using his deadly potions to wreak havoc on the battlefield.

Resistance Singed takes Singed's story in a different direction. In this alternate universe, Singed is a freedom fighter, leading a rebellion against the oppressive forces that seek to control Zaun. Clad in his resistance gear, Singed fights for the rights of the people, using his chemical expertise to turn the tide of battle.

The skin's design reflects Singed's transformation into a rebel leader. His gas mask protects him from the toxic fumes of Zaun, while his armor shields him from enemy attacks. The canister on his back contains a potent mixture of chemicals, ready to be unleashed upon his foes. The visual effects of Resistance Singed's abilities also match the theme, with green toxic trails and explosions that leave a lasting impact.

Resistance Singed represents a different side of Singed's character, showcasing his determination and resilience in the face of adversity. It adds depth to his lore and provides players with a fresh perspective on this iconic champion.

Additionally, Singed's playstyle requires a unique understanding of positioning and map control, as he often relies on split-pushing and drawing attention away from his team.

In terms of lore, Singed's story is intertwined with other champions from Zaun, such as Warwick and Jinx. His experiments and chemical warfare have left a lasting impact on the city, shaping its dark and dangerous reputation. Singed's actions have also caught the attention of other factions, including the secretive organization known as the League of Legends.

Singed (Default)

Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Singed, the Mad Chemist, is a unique and iconic champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his toxic abilities and unorthodox playstyle, Singed has become a favorite among players who enjoy disrupting the enemy team and causing chaos on the battlefield. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Singed's default costume and explore the details of his appearance.

The Story of Singed's Default Costume

Singed's default costume represents his original appearance when he was first introduced to the League of Legends universe. Clad in a tattered lab coat and wearing a gas mask, Singed embodies the image of a deranged scientist who revels in the chaos he creates. His unkempt hair and crazed expression further emphasize his unstable nature.

The tattered lab coat, stained with various chemicals and potions, symbolizes Singed's expertise in alchemy and his relentless pursuit of knowledge. It serves as a reminder of his twisted experiments and the dangerous concoctions he wields against his enemies. The gas mask, which covers his face, not only protects him from the toxic fumes he creates but also adds an air of mystery to his character.

Overall, Singed's default costume perfectly captures his persona as the Mad Chemist, showcasing his unhinged nature and his dedication to spreading chaos and destruction.

Singed: The Mad Chemist

Singed's story within the League of Legends universe is as intriguing as his appearance. Born in the city-state of Zaun, a place known for its industrial pollution and experimentation, Singed was always drawn to the dark side of science. He became obsessed with alchemy and chemistry, conducting dangerous experiments that pushed the boundaries of ethical research.

His unorthodox methods and disregard for the well-being of others led to his expulsion from the prestigious Chemtech University. Undeterred, Singed continued his experiments in secret, perfecting his toxic brews and creating deadly concoctions that would later become his arsenal on the battlefield.

When the League of Legends was formed, Singed saw an opportunity to further his research and spread chaos on a grand scale. He joined the League as a champion, using his toxic abilities to sow discord and confusion among his enemies. Singed's unique playstyle revolves around his ability to leave a trail of poison behind him, damaging and slowing anyone unfortunate enough to step in his path.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Singed's playstyle is characterized by his ability to disrupt the enemy team and create chaos in team fights. His poison trail, combined with his fling ability, allows him to isolate and pick off squishy targets, making him a formidable threat in the right hands.

One of Singed's greatest strengths is his ability to tank damage and survive in the midst of battle. His ultimate ability, Insanity Potion, grants him increased stats and crowd control reduction, making him incredibly difficult to kill. Singed players often find themselves diving into the enemy team, soaking up damage while their teammates follow up with devastating attacks.

However, Singed does have his weaknesses. He lacks reliable crowd control, making it difficult for him to lock down slippery opponents. Additionally, his poison trail requires him to be in close proximity to enemies, leaving him vulnerable to champions with long-range abilities or heavy burst damage.

Furthermore, Singed's playstyle heavily relies on his ability to manipulate the battlefield and control the flow of the game. If he falls behind in the early stages, it can be challenging for him to catch up and have a significant impact in team fights.

Singed in the League of Legends

Singed has carved out a unique niche for himself in the League of Legends community. His unconventional playstyle and disruptive abilities make him a favorite among players who enjoy unorthodox champions. Singed's ability to create chaos and disrupt the enemy team's plans often leads to memorable moments and exciting gameplay.

Whether it's flinging an enemy carry into the midst of your team or running circles around your opponents, Singed brings a sense of unpredictability to the game. His presence alone can force the enemy team to adjust their strategies, making him a valuable asset in any team composition.

which transforms him into a member of the elite Riot Squad.

The Riot Squad Singed skin features a complete overhaul of Singed's appearance. He dons a sleek, black tactical suit with riot gear, including a helmet, gas mask, and body armor. The skin also includes unique particle effects, turning Singed's toxic abilities into a more futuristic and high-tech version. The green poison gas he emits is replaced with a blue, electrified gas, adding an extra level of visual appeal to his gameplay.

As a member of the Riot Squad, Singed's abilities take on a new level of intensity. His Q ability, Poison Trail, leaves behind a trail of electrified gas, visually representing the skin's theme. His W ability, Mega Adhesive, creates a sticky blue substance that immobilizes enemies, further emphasizing the futuristic aesthetic. Singed's E ability, Fling, allows him to toss enemies over his shoulder with enhanced strength, showcasing his superior Riot Squad training. Finally, his ultimate ability, Insanity Potion, grants him increased movement speed, health regeneration, and crowd control reduction, making him an even more formidable force on the battlefield.

Now, let's delve into the lore and story behind Singed and his Riot Squad skin. Singed, also known as the Mad Chemist, hails from the city-state of Zaun, a place known for its technological advancements and dark underbelly. Singed is a brilliant chemist who has dedicated his life to the pursuit of knowledge and experimentation, often at the expense of others.

In the world of League of Legends, Singed's past is shrouded in mystery. He is believed to have been a student of the infamous Warwick, the Blood Hunter, who also hails from Zaun. Singed's experiments with chemical concoctions and potions have granted him incredible strength and resilience, but at the cost of his sanity.

As a champion, Singed is known for his unique playstyle. He excels at disrupting the enemy team and creating chaos on the battlefield. Singed's Poison Trail leaves a trail of toxic gas behind him, damaging enemies who dare to chase him. His Mega Adhesive ability creates a sticky pool that slows and immobilizes enemies, making it difficult for them to escape his grasp. Singed's Fling ability allows him to toss enemies over his shoulder, dealing damage and potentially throwing them into his team. Finally, his Insanity Potion grants him increased stats, making him a formidable tank and disruptor.

Singed's strengths lie in his ability to disrupt the enemy team and create chaos. His Poison Trail and Mega Adhesive abilities can turn team fights in his favor, as enemies struggle to navigate through his toxic arsenal. Singed's Fling ability also allows him to isolate and pick off squishy targets, making him a threat to the enemy backline. Additionally, his Insanity Potion provides him with increased survivability and allows him to dive into the enemy team with confidence.

However, Singed also has his weaknesses. He lacks reliable crowd control, making it difficult for him to lock down mobile champions. Additionally, Singed's damage output is primarily focused on sustained damage over time, rather than burst damage. This means that he may struggle against champions who can quickly burst him down before he can fully utilize his abilities.

In the world of League of Legends, Singed has become an iconic champion. His unique playstyle and memorable appearance have made him a favorite among players. Whether you're a fan of his classic look or prefer the futuristic Riot Squad Singed skin, there's no denying the impact Singed has had on the game.

Now, let's delve into the story of Singed and his place in the League of Legends universe. Singed, also known as the Mad Chemist, is a Zaunite alchemist who is infamous for his twisted experiments and disregard for ethical boundaries. He is driven by a relentless pursuit of knowledge and power, often resorting to unethical means to achieve his goals.

Singed's past in the game is shrouded in mystery, but it is believed that he was once a respected chemist who worked for the Noxian military. However, his insatiable curiosity and desire for power led him down a dark path. Singed began conducting dangerous experiments on both humans and animals, using them as subjects to test his concoctions and potions.

His experiments resulted in the creation of a deadly poison known as Noxian Guile, which he used to devastating effect on the battlefield. Singed's poison not only inflicts damage over time but also impairs the movement and abilities of his enemies, making him a formidable force to be reckoned with.

In the League of Legends, Singed is a tanky champion who excels at disrupting the enemy team and creating chaos in team fights. His signature ability, Poison Trail, leaves a trail of poison behind him, damaging and slowing any enemies who come into contact with it. Singed can also fling enemies over his shoulder with Fling, and his ultimate ability, Insanity Potion, grants him increased movement speed, health regeneration, and crowd control reduction.

Despite his strengths, Singed does have weaknesses. He lacks reliable crowd control and can be easily kited by champions with high mobility. Additionally, his damage output is relatively low compared to other champions, making him more reliant on his team to secure kills.

Overall, Singed is a unique and iconic champion in the League of Legends universe. His unorthodox playstyle and unpredictable nature make him a favorite among players who enjoy disrupting the enemy team and creating chaos on the battlefield.
